info.name: Client API
info.description: API endpoints for the staycation's client

request.description:
API endpoint for the landing page (client path: `/`).

This endpoint returns the statistics, the topmost properties, and the topmost properties for each category.

response.name: Landing Page Data

request.description:
API endpoint for the property detail page (client path: `/properties/:propertyId`).

This endpoint returns detailed information about a property as well as a testimonial about that property.

response.name: Property Details
response.body:

request.description: This endpoint serves to record user bookings
This endpoint returns all the banks that have been registered by the admin.

response.name: Banks
response.body:
